name: Exquisite repairing shard
description: Scientist Eric Snow discovered that some Crystal can be used to repair the Gashapon Headwears of Kafra Co. But different Headwears need Crystal of different quality to repair. Refined Crystal shard can be used to repair Gashapon Headwear of purple and Blue quality.

name: Eye Bandage
description: The blinker is used for eye protection, when eyes get hurt.

name: Eye Bandage Blueprint
description: The blinker is used for eye protection, when eyes get hurt.

name: Eye of Dawn
description: Through the Dawn, we will see the hope. Through the Dawn, we will see the light of humanity.

name: Eye of Dawn Blueprint
description: Through the Dawn, we will see the hope. Through the Dawn, we will see the light of humanity.

name: Eye of Dullahan
description: A strange ring made into a spectacle.
effect: Dex ＋5,[Wizardry Staff VIII] ＋ [Robe of Cast VIII] ＋ [Eye of Dullahan VIII] ＋ [Crystal Pumps IV]: －5% CT Variable, ＋3% M.Dmg, ＋3% Ignore MDef

name: Eye of Dullahan [1]
description: A strange ring made into a spectacle.

name: Eye Scar
description: Those battles will not be forgotten and those teammates will always be in the bottom of heart. Although there is no expression on his face, scar is telling the story.

name: Fabric
description: This is a magical piece of cloth that is transparent and glows. Being a very rare item, it can be used to make high-end headwear.

name: Facebook 1.000.000 Likes Pack
description: A gift pack for RO lovers like you. Open to get Blue Potion×30, Butterfly Wing×20, Kafra Teleport Ticket×20.

name: Facebook 1.200.000 Likes Pack
description: A gift pack for RO lovers like you. Open to get Leaf of Yggdrasil×10, Dish Pack A×5, Amazing Toy Box×5.

name: Facebook 1.500.000 Likes Pack
description: A gift pack for RO lovers like you. Open to get Mora Coin×2, Dish Pack B×2, Lightning Chain×2.

name: Facebook 2.000.000 Likes Pack
description: A gift pack for RO lovers like you. Open to get Mora Coin×3, Gift from Guild×3, Gold Medal×3.

name: Facebook 800.000 Likes Pack
description: A gift pack for RO lovers like you. Open to get White Potion×30, Fly Wing×20, Kafra Storage Voucher×20.

name: Fairy Chips
description: Delicious snacks from the other world. INT ＋ 10, Magic Dam ＋20%, For 30 min. (The effect cannot be stacked with Int food)

name: Fairy in Bottle
description: Hem, how many times have I said it? I am the lovely Fairy in Bottle, not little black guy in bottle!
effect: Hit ＋20,auto attack has a 5% chance to trigger [Fury Burst], [Fury Burst]: Crit.Dmg ＋100%; the effect lasts 3 seconds

name: Fairy Tale Gashapon
description: A Gashapon toy to express personal feelings, open it to randomly receive one headwear of Sep 2017 [Magic Masquerade - Fairy Tale] series.
